issue.title: [Rust] Remove unused hashmap
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8752](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8752). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
both base_nodes and base_nodes_set doesn't seem to be used at all in build_array_reader.
